name: Exsite
description:
This game was created as part of the "Unity Essentials of Real Time 2D Challange". It's a small 2D game where you need to destroy a number of falling objects with a platform to score points. If the objects hit your platform more in the middle you will score a higher point amount.

To navigate the menu use your mouse. To move the platform user either A/D or Left/Right arrow key's.

Enjoy and leave a comment if you like. I highl appreciate ideas for a new name of the game.

Additional Resources:

Brackeys - Free 2D Mega Assets

Google Font VT323
